mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customers (customer_email, customer_id, customer_pw, customer_name, customer_nick_name) VALUES (#{customerEmail}, #{customerId}, #{customerPw}, #{customerName}, #{customerNickName})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM customers WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND customer_pw = #{customerPw} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
SELECT customer_idx, customer_email, customer_id, customer_pw, customer_name, customer_nick_name, customer_address, customer_phone, customer_level FROM customers WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}

SELECT customer_email, customer_id, customer_pw, customer_name, customer_nick_name, customer_address, customer_phone, customer_level FROM customers WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE customers SET customer_email = #{customerEmail}, customer_pw = #{customerPw}, customer_name = #{customerName}, customer_address = #{customerAddress}, customer_phone = #{customerPhone} WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
UPDATE customers SET deleted_yn = 'Y' WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
